description: 1-minute demo: AI-powered loan origination with automated document processing, eligibility assessment, and accelerated underwriting
trigger_phrases: Process this mortgage application and give me an eligibility assessment with documentation status.

persona.name: Jennifer Walsh
persona.title: Mortgage Operations Manager
persona.context: Processing 400 mortgage applications monthly with 45-day average close time, seeking to reduce to 30 days

agents_utilized.description: Ingests and validates loan application data from all channels
Extracts and validates data from uploaded documents using AI
Evaluates borrower eligibility across loan programs
Performs comprehensive credit and financial analysis
Assesses property value and validates collateral
Manages underwriting conditions and documentation requirements
Generates loan processing summaries and timeline projections

conversation_flow.user_message: Process this mortgage application and give me an eligibility assessment with documentation status.
conversation_flow.agent_response:
I've processed the Martinez application. Strong profile, 92% documentation complete.

**Application Summary:**

| Field | Details |
|-------|--------|
| Borrowers | Michael & Sarah Martinez |
| Loan purpose | Purchase |
| Property | 1234 Oak Lane, Suburban Heights |
| Purchase price | $485,000 |
| Loan amount | $388,000 |
| Down payment | $97,000 (20%) |

**Document Status:**

| Category | Status | Items |
|----------|--------|-------|
| Income | 90% complete | Missing 1 paystub |
| Assets | 100% complete | All verified |
| Property | 85% complete | Awaiting appraisal |
| Identity | 100% complete | Verified |

**Initial Eligibility Check:**

| Criteria | Result | Status |
|----------|--------|--------|
| Credit score | 742/756 | Excellent |
| DTI (estimated) | 32% | Within limits |
| LTV | 80% | Conventional eligible |
| Employment | Stable (5+ years) | Strong |

**Missing Items:**
- Michael's most recent paystub (requested)
- Appraisal (ordered, due in 5 days)

Source: [LOS + Document Portal + Credit Bureau]
Agents: ApplicationIntakeAgent, DocumentProcessingAgent

Run detailed eligibility and program matching?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, which loan programs are they eligible for?
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Program eligibility complete. Qualified for 4 programs, Conventional 30-year is optimal.

**Program Eligibility Matrix:**

| Program | Eligible | Rate | Monthly Payment |
|---------|----------|------|----------------|
| Conventional 30-yr | Yes | 6.875% | $2,548 |
| Conventional 15-yr | Yes | 6.25% | $3,324 |
| FHA 30-yr | Yes | 6.5% | $2,642 + MIP |
| Jumbo | No | N/A | Loan too small |

**Recommended: Conventional 30-Year**

| Advantage | Details |
|-----------|--------|
| No PMI | 20% down payment |
| Best rate | Excellent credit qualifies |
| Lower payment | vs 15-year option |
| No MIP | vs FHA (saves $320/mo) |

**Loan Terms Calculated:**

| Component | Amount |
|-----------|--------|
| Principal & Interest | $2,548 |
| Property taxes | $485 |
| Insurance | $165 |
| **Total PITI** | **$3,198** |

**Eligibility Conditions:**
1. Verify income with missing paystub
2. Complete appraisal (ordered)
3. Clear title commitment
4. Final credit refresh before close

Source: [Underwriting Guidelines + Rate Engine]
Agents: EligibilityAssessmentAgent, DocumentProcessingAgent

See credit and property analysis?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, show me the credit and property analysis
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Credit and property analysis complete. Both look strong with no red flags.

**Credit Analysis:**

| Borrower | Score | Payment History | Utilization |
|----------|-------|-----------------|-------------|
| Michael | 742 | 100% on-time | 18% |
| Sarah | 756 | 100% on-time | 12% |

**Debt-to-Income Ratios:**

| Ratio | Calculated | Limit | Status |
|-------|------------|-------|--------|
| Front-end | 26% | 28% | Pass |
| Back-end | 32% | 45% | Pass |
| Residual income | $4,200 | $2,500 | Exceeds |

**Asset Verification:**
- Checking: $24,000 ✓
- Savings: $82,000 ✓
- 401(k): $145,000 ✓
- Reserves: 8 months (excellent)

**Property Valuation:**

| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Purchase price | $485,000 |
| AVM estimate | $492,000 |
| Comparable range | $475K - $510K |
| LTV at purchase | 80% |
| Appraisal risk | Low |

**Property Notes:**
- Single family, 3BR/2BA
- Built 2018, excellent condition
- Clear title (preliminary)
- No flood zone concerns

Source: [Credit Bureau + AVM + Property Records]
Agents: CreditAnalysisAgent, PropertyValuationAgent

Generate condition checklist?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, what conditions need to be cleared?
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Condition checklist generated. 4 items remaining before clear-to-close.

**Prior-to-Docs Conditions:**

| Condition | Status | Owner | Due |
|-----------|--------|-------|-----|
| Recent paystub | Pending | Borrower | 2 days |
| Appraisal | Ordered | Vendor | 5 days |
| Title commitment | In progress | Title co. | 3 days |
| VOE (verbal) | Scheduled | LO | 1 day |

**Prior-to-Funding Conditions:**

| Condition | Status | When |
|-----------|--------|------|
| Final credit check | Pending | At closing |
| Proof of insurance | Pending | Before close |
| Wire instructions | Pending | Before close |
| Signed closing docs | Pending | At closing |

**Condition Details:**

**Paystub (Missing Item):**
- Needed: Most recent dated within 30 days
- Request sent: Yesterday
- Borrower response: "Uploading tonight"

**Appraisal:**
- Ordered: 2 days ago
- Appraiser: Assigned
- Expected: 5 business days
- Rush available: +$150 (3 days)

**Automated Tracking:**
- Borrower portal shows pending items
- Auto-reminders: Daily until complete
- Status alerts: You'll be notified on receipt

Source: [LOS + Document Management]
Agents: ConditionTrackingAgent, DocumentProcessingAgent

See timeline and next steps?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, what's the projected timeline to close?
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Timeline analysis complete. On track for 28-day close (beating 30-day target).

**Projected Timeline:**

| Milestone | Target Date | Status |
|-----------|-------------|--------|
| Application complete | Day 3 (today) | Pending paystub |
| Appraisal received | Day 8 | Ordered |
| Conditions cleared | Day 12 | On track |
| Clear to close | Day 18 | Projected |
| Closing | Day 28 | Scheduled |

**Critical Path Items:**

| Item | Impact if Delayed |
|------|-------------------|
| Paystub | +1 day per day late |
| Appraisal | +3-5 days if issues |
| Title | +2 days if liens found |

**Acceleration Opportunities:**

| Action | Savings | Cost |
|--------|---------|------|
| Rush appraisal | 2 days | +$150 |
| Same-day VOE | 1 day | Included |
| E-closing | 0.5 days | Included |

**Next Steps (Today):**
1. Follow up on paystub (borrower uploading tonight)
2. Complete verbal VOE with employer
3. Confirm appraisal inspection date

**Next Steps (This Week):**
- Review appraisal when received
- Clear title commitment
- Submit to underwriting

Source: [LOS + Timeline Analytics]
Agents: ConditionTrackingAgent, OriginationSummaryAgent

Generate complete loan summary?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, give me the complete loan processing summary
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Loan processing summary complete. Strong application on track for fast close.

**Martinez Loan Summary:**

| Element | Status |
|---------|--------|
| Application | 92% complete |
| Eligibility | Approved - Conventional |
| Credit | Excellent (742/756) |
| Property | AVM supports value |
| Conditions | 4 of 8 cleared |

**Loan Details:**

| Specification | Value |
|---------------|-------|
| Loan amount | $388,000 |
| Rate | 6.875% (locked) |
| Term | 30-year fixed |
| Monthly PITI | $3,198 |
| Down payment | $97,000 (20%) |
| Closing costs | ~$8,200 |

**Quality Indicators:**

| Factor | Assessment |
|--------|------------|
| Credit risk | Low |
| Collateral risk | Low |
| Income stability | Strong |
| Reserve adequacy | Excellent |

**Timeline:**
- Projected close: 28 days
- Target close: 30 days
- Status: Ahead of schedule

**Outstanding Items:**
1. Paystub (tonight)
2. Appraisal (5 days)
3. Title (3 days)
4. VOE (tomorrow)

Source: [All Origination Systems]
Agents: OriginationSummaryAgent (orchestrating all agents)

Your AI-powered origination processed the Martinez application in minutes, confirmed eligibility for 4 programs, and projects a 28-day close - 17 days faster than your current average.

design_principles.visual_elements: 1 status indicator OR 1 table per response

business_value.problem: 45-day average close time, manual document processing, fragmented condition tracking, delayed eligibility decisions
business_value.solution: AI-powered loan origination with automated document processing, instant eligibility assessment, and intelligent condition tracking
business_value.roi: Reduce close time from 45 to 28 days (38% improvement), automated document validation, accelerated underwriting
business_value.performance: Application processed in minutes, 4 program eligibility checks, real-time condition tracking, accurate timeline projection
